name: Lilliam Pumpernickel 4
description:
CHECK OUT THE TRAILER

EPILEPSY WARNING: This game has a ton of flashing colors and lights. Three long years  of peace crushed by a threat from long ago; when Lilliam's new song is stolen, the entire balance of the rap game is thrown off, and now he is the only one who can track down the mysterious culprit and bring them to justice.  His journey will take him far and wide, to places from his past, and places no mortal was ever meant to be. Lilliam Pumpernickel 4 is a hard as hell top down shooter with a linear structure. You will work your way through 4 diverse and well crafted worlds, each with 13-15 levels, and 2-3 bosses. Each level consists of running through a semi-open area, blasting tons of enemies, hiding behind cover, and dodging bullets until you reach the flag at the end of the level.  Four Different Exciting Worlds To Explore

Over 60 levels to complete!

Fast Paced - Exhilarating Gameplay

Easy to pick up, hard to master

An Emotional Story

*Not actually that emotional*

Intense Boss Fights

Plus a boss rush mode!

50 Track Long OST

With nothing but bangers! (Also theres a built in music player)

Built In Randomizers

What the fuck is even happening

Achievements

There's also unlockable skins and extra modes!

I Don't Know, I'm Running Out Of Tag Lines

Just play the game at this point
